# elicitator

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: maturing](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-maturing-blue.svg)](https://www.tidyverse.org/lifecycle/#maturing)
[![AppVeyor build status](https://ci.appveyor.com/api/projects/status/github/UBESP-DCTV/elicitator?branch=master&svg=true)](https://ci.appveyor.com/project/UBESP-DCTV/elicitator)

The goal of **elicitator** is to define an expert elicitation WEB app to
answer with regard to _Case Study 2_ of EFSA's OC/EFSA/AMU/2019/02.
